about.intro: I'm a Software Engineer specializing in MERN stack development, currently pursuing a BSc in Computer Science at BRAC University while working as a Junior Software Engineer at Fatmonk Studio.
about.details: My journey in tech began with frontend development and has since evolved into full-stack engineering, where I craft scalable, high-performance applications from concept to deployment. I‚Äôve built and contributed to SaaS platforms, POS systems, headless e-commerce solutions, analytics dashboards, workflow automation tools, and custom CRM systems, focusing on creating seamless, efficient, and maintainable digital experiences that drive business impact. I specialize in React, Next.js, Node.js, Nest.js, and modern web technologies, with a strong emphasis on clean architecture, scalability, and performance optimization. My development approach blends best practices in API design, modular architecture, and cloud-native deployment to ensure reliability and maintainability at scale.
about.philosophy: I believe in clean code, continuous learning, and delivering projects on time with uncompromising quality. Every project is an opportunity to solve real-world problems through technology, and I‚Äôm passionate about building products that make a meaningful impact.

projects.title: Monocart - E-commerce Platform

achievements: Specialized in MERN stack delivering full-stack solutions with clean architecture

Built end-to-end SaaS applications, POS and inventory management systems, headless e-commerce platforms, and data analytics dashboards with a focus on performance, scalability, and clean architecture.
Collaborated with stakeholders for requirement gathering and ongoing support

Handled frontend architecture, routing, state management, and API integration

info.txt.content:
Name: Muhammad Mujtahid
Role: Software Engineer
Location: Dhaka, Bangladesh

About:
I'm a Software Engineer specializing in MERN stack development. Currently pursuing BSc in Computer Science at BRAC University while working as a Junior Software Engineer at Fatmonk Studio. My journey in tech started with frontend development and has evolved into full-stack expertise.

I have hands-on experience building admin dashboards, analytics tools, e-commerce platforms, and CRM systems. I specialize in React, Next.js, Node JS, and modern web technologies with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions that meet client requirements.

Philosophy:
I believe in clean architecture, continuous learning, and delivering projects on time with high quality. Every project is an opportunity to solve real-world problems through technology.

Quick Facts:
- Experience: 3+ Years
- Location: Dhaka, Bangladesh
- Education: BRAC University
- Projects: 7+ Major

list.txt.content:
Major Projects:

1. Monocart - E-commerce Platform
   Comprehensive e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, and payment integration.
   Tech Stack: Next JS, Nest JS, PostgreSQL, Tailwind
   Demo: https://monocart.vercel.app/
   GitHub: https://github.com/mujtahid705/MonoCart-Backend

2. SparkleMusic
   Cross-platform React Native app for music streaming and downloads from YouTube.
   Tech Stack: React Native, Expo
   GitHub: https://github.com/abtahi-tajwar/SparkleMusic

3. Simply Gaines
   A platform to manage social media and brand management tools with an online marketplace platform for freelance contributors with authentication and role-based authorization system.
   Tech Stack: React, Social Media Integration, Role-based Auth, Tailwind
   Demo: https://live.simplygaines.fatmonk.studio/

4. Bangladesh Startup Connect 2025
   Dynamic event website with CMS functionality for BIDA's investment summit.
   Tech Stack: React, Redux, Tailwind
   Demo: https://connect.startupbangladesh.gov.bd/

5. Task Master Pro
   Centralized project and team management platform with role-based permissions.
   Tech Stack: React, Node JS, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose
   GitHub: https://github.com/mujtahid705/TaskMasterPro_frontend

6. Fatmonk Studio Website
   Official website with custom CMS-like functionality and secure backend.
   Tech Stack: React, Node JS, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose
   Demo: https://fatmonk.studio/

7. Feerot
   E-commerce coupon and discount platform with real-time tracking.
   Tech Stack: React, Redux
   GitHub: https://github.com/n0k1b/feerotFrontend/tree/master
